comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.gamestar.de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gamestar.de%2F) ### Comment > Pop-up muss akzeptiert werden, sonst kann man die Seite nicht nutzen! Wenn Ihr es nicht reproduzieren könnt, dann löscht euren Verlauf und auch bei Safari - Einstellungen - Datenschutz - Websitedaten verwalten -> alle Daten. Dann solltet Ihr das Pop-up Fenster beim aufrufen der Seite auch haben. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
我不確定要說中文還是機翻成英文，所以請讓我先用中文
目前我已試過的規則如下：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$script
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$object
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##script
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##object
但是並沒有作用，而其他的如：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$third-party
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$other
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$～object
則是不能連上網頁？，上面圖1的部分會出現錯誤

關於app的補充，與之前的#21078是相同的
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/21078#issuecomment-412828928

但是可以阻擋廣告，卻不能阻擋上面圖2的內容

issue.title: www.hellomarket.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hellomarket.com/search?q=%EC%94%BD%ED%81%AC%ED%8C%A8%EB%93%9C+%EB%85%B8%ED%8A%B8%EB%B6%81](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hellomarket.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25EC%2594%25BD%25ED%2581%25AC%25ED%258C%25A8%25EB%2593%259C%2B%25EB%2585%25B8%25ED%258A%25B8%25EB%25B6%2581) ### Comment Username: @bokkwonsu > 헬로마켓 웹사이트에서 상품 검색이 왜 안되는지 그 이유를 찾았습니다. > > 구글 크롬 브라우저에 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하여 사용하는데 광고 차단을 활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출되지 않고, 광고 차단을 비활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출됩니다. > > 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하셔서 다시한번 재확인 부탁드리고, 광고가 아닌 상품 검색결과가 차단되는 것은 필터 문제인거 같아 'AdGuard' 측에 필터 수정을 요청하셔야 될거 같습니다 > > https://adguard.com/ko/ ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9zYzAhb.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/yO1YdLP.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.204 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard Japanese,
EasyList Czech and Slovak,
Liste AR,
List-KR

comment.body:
Isn't the test wrong?

If you enable the AdGuard filter, if you still search for a product on a website called 'Hello Market', the search results list will not be exposed.
